revised_title: Modulation of Water Waves on Shear Flows: A Nonlinear Schrödinger Equation Approach
tldr: The article examines the modulation of water waves on arbitrary shear flows using the method of multiple scales. It derives a nonlinear Schrödinger equation with coefficients that depend on the shear, which agrees with previous work for the case of no shear and the long-wave limit of the Korteweg-de Vries equation. The results can be used to study the stability of Stokes waves over any shear.
